chapter.title: Installation issues
chapter.para: This section provides you with the steps on how to start with JBoss Portal and integrated features using JBoss Tools.

listitem.para: First, you need to have Eclipse Ganymede with JBoss Tools 3.0.0.Alpha1 and higher installed.

tip.title: Tip:
tip.para: Read JBoss Tools Installation section in our Getting Started documentation to find out how to install JBoss Tools onto Eclipse.

listitem.para: Next, download the JBoss Portal + JBoss AS bundle from JBoss Portal Download page

note.title: Note:
note.para: You need JBoss Portal 2.7 if you want to work with a Portlet 2.0

listitem.para: Extract the bundle wherever you want on your hard drive

chapter.para: Now, when you have it installed, we are going to demonstrate some powerful features of JBoss Portal tooling for Eclipse.
